mapper.select: SELECT prSeq, prTitle, prStartDate, prEndDate, prHostedPlanned, prAgeLimit, prAttenDance, prDetails, prRgstrDate, prModifiedDate, prdeleteNY FROM performanceList WHERE 1=1 AND prSeq = #{prSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE performanceList SET prTitle = #{prTitle}, prHostedPlanned = #{prHostedPlanned}, prAgeLimit = #{prAgeLimit}, prStartDate = #{prStartDate}, prEndDate = #{prEndDate} WHERE prSeq = #{prSeq}
